biotools.summary: Program for designing pairs of degenerate primers for a given set of DNA sequences. HYDEN works well for large input sets of genomic sequences (e.g., hundreds of sequences of length 1Kbp).

bioschemas.name: HYDEN
bioschemas.summary: Program for designing pairs of degenerate primers for a given set of DNA sequences. HYDEN works well for large input sets of genomic sequences (e.g., hundreds of sequences of length 1Kbp).
